text: Isi tarah un logon par bhi koi aiteraaz ka mauqa nahin hai jihon ne khud aa kar tumse darkhwast ki thi ke hamare liye sawariyan baham pahunchayi jayein, aur jab tumne kaha ke main tumhare liye sawariyon ka intizam nahin kar sakta to woh majbooran wapas gaye aur haal yeh tha ke unki aankhon se aansu (tears) jaari thay aur unhein is baat ka bada ranjj tha ke woh apne kharch par shareek e jihad honay ki maqdarat nahin rakhte
